item.title: Mantras of Life ✍️
item.description: Advices You are unique 🫶 Leave every place/ relationship that doesn’t value you. Love yourself. Believe in yourself. Speak up. Your opinion matters. You miss out on 100% of things if you don't ask for things/ put forth your opinions. Speaking up brings that probability to 50-50. Your opinions are different and you need to embrace them. Everything about you, that you think is “weird” is actually your biggest strength because it makes you different in a sea of people.
